languages.text: "Шерин, видать, триумф над пособниками Архиврага застил тебе разум, ибо как иначе могу я объяснить то, что сейчас слышу? Орудие врага Человечества — и на борт избранни{mf|ка|цы} Великого? Помилуй..."

"Shereen, your triumph over the Archenemy's knaves must have obscured your mind, for what other explanation can I find for what I'm hearing? To bring a weapon of Humanity's bane on board the ship of the Exalted One's chosen? I mean..."
languages.original_text: "Шерин, видать, триумф над пособниками Архиврага застил тебе разум, ибо как иначе могу я объяснить то, что сейчас слышу? Орудие врага Человечества — и на борт избранни{mf|ка|цы} Великого? Помилуй..."

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, your triumph over the Archenemy's knaves must have obscured your mind, for what other explanation can I find for what I'm hearing? To bring a weapon of Humanity's bane on board the ship of the Exalted One's chosen? This is..."

"Shereen, your triumph over the Archenemy's knaves must have obscured your mind, for what other explanation can I find for what I'm hearing? To bring a weapon of Humanity's bane on board the ship of the Exalted One's chosen? I mean..."

languages.text: « Shereen, votre triomphe sur les sbires du Grand Ennemi a dû vous embrouiller l'esprit. Comment expliquer autrement cette décision d'apporter une arme du fléau de l'humanité à bord du vaisseau de l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Exalté ? Enfin... »
languages.original_text: "Shereen, your triumph over the Archenemy's knaves must have obscured your mind, for what other explanation can I find for what I'm hearing? To bring a weapon of Humanity's bane on board the ship of the Exalted One's chosen? I mean..."

traits.locale_text: « Shereen, votre triomphe sur les sbires du Grand Ennemi a dû vous embrouiller l'esprit. Comment expliquer autrement cette décision d'apporter une arme du fléau de l'humanité à bord du vaisseau de l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Exalté ? Enfin... »

languages.text: "Shereen, Euer Triumph über die Schergen des Erzfeinds muss Euren Verstand getrübt haben, denn welch andere Erklärung kann ich für dafür finden, was ich höre? Eine Waffe der Geißel der Menschheit auf das Schiff {mf|des|der} Auserwählten des Erhabenen zu bringen? Ich meine ..."
languages.original_text: "Shereen, your triumph over the Archenemy's knaves must have obscured your mind, for what other explanation can I find for what I'm hearing? To bring a weapon of Humanity's bane on board the ship of the Exalted One's chosen? I mean..."

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, Euer Triumph über die Schergen des Erzfeinds muss Euren Verstand getrübt haben, denn welch andere Erklärung kann ich für dafür finden, was ich höre? Eine Waffe der Geißel der Menschheit auf das Schiff {mf|des|der} Auserwählten des Erhabenen zu bringen? Ich meine ..."

languages.text: «Shereen, creo que el triunfo sobre los canallas al servicio del Archienemigo le ha ocasionado una cierta enajenación, porque si no, no me explico lo que oigo. ¿Quiere traer un arma creada para destruir a la Humanidad a bordo de la nave de{mf|l| la} elegid{mf|o|a} del Emperador? No sé...».
languages.original_text: "Shereen, your triumph over the Archenemy's knaves must have obscured your mind, for what other explanation can I find for what I'm hearing? To bring a weapon of Humanity's bane on board the ship of the Exalted One's chosen? I mean..."

traits.locale_text: «Shereen, creo que el triunfo sobre los canallas al servicio del Archienemigo le ha ocasionado una cierta enajenación, porque si no, no me explico lo que oigo. ¿Quiere traer un arma creada para destruir a la Humanidad a bordo de la nave de{mf|l| la} elegid{mf|o|a} del Emperador? No sé...».

languages.text: 「シャリーン、渾沌の勢力への勝利でその心は曇ってしまったみたいね。だって、それ以外には今聞いたことの説明しようがないでしょう？人類の災いの武器をエグザルテッド・ワンに選ばれし者の船に乗せる？それってつまり…」
languages.original_text: "Shereen, your triumph over the Archenemy's knaves must have obscured your mind, for what other explanation can I find for what I'm hearing? To bring a weapon of Humanity's bane on board the ship of the Exalted One's chosen? I mean..."

traits.locale_text: 「シャリーン、渾沌の勢力への勝利でその心は曇ってしまったみたいね。だって、それ以外には今聞いたことの説明しようがないでしょう？人類の災いの武器をエグザルテッド・ワンに選ばれし者の船に乗せる？それってつまり…」

languages.text: “亲爱的，你肯定是被战胜混沌大敌的胜利冲昏了头脑吧，若非如此，我还能怎么理解我听到的这些话呢？真的要把人类之敌的致命武器，带到至高无上的神皇的神选者船上吗？我是说……”
languages.original_text: "Shereen, your triumph over the Archenemy's knaves must have obscured your mind, for what other explanation can I find for what I'm hearing? To bring a weapon of Humanity's bane on board the ship of the Exalted One's chosen? I mean..."

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的，你肯定是被战胜混沌大敌的胜利冲昏了头脑吧，若非如此，我还能怎么理解我听到的这些话呢？真的要把人类之敌的致命武器，带到至高无上的神皇的神选者船上吗？我是说……”

languages.text: "Şerbaşı'nın uşaklarına karşı zaferin, kafanı karıştırmış olmalı şirinim. Bu duyduklarımın başka bir izahı olamaz herhâlde. Görkemli'nin seçilmişinin gemisine İnsanlığın celladı olan bir silahı almak... Yani..."
languages.original_text: "Shereen, your triumph over the Archenemy's knaves must have obscured your mind, for what other explanation can I find for what I'm hearing? To bring a weapon of Humanity's bane on board the ship of the Exalted One's chosen? I mean..."
